course.subject: HUMA
course.name: Visual Anthropology
course.description: This course examines cultural anthropologistsâ€™ basic research methodologies and their products, ethnographic films and photos. The variability in human behavior explored through visual and auditory documentaries. Students will work on audio-visual projects to record and interpret cultural activities of a particular community. Topics in culture and society, recording of human behavior, field research, production of documentary, social interaction, editing and analysis, and ethic are examined.
